definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)

sentences.english: I think you are too busy to take an afternoon off.
sentences.chinese: 我想你們真是忙得連個下午都抽不出來了。

sentences.english: Then, from Tuesday afternoon through Thursday, the stars send intense and beautiful energy your way.
sentences.chinese: 從週二下午到週四，巨蟹宮將會釋放強勁的能量。

sentences.english: This afternoon Tietz declared the letter to be a forgery.
sentences.chinese: 當天下午Tietz聲明信件是僞造的。

sentences.english: The man spent every afternoon on her six-meter wide garden.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人每天下午都在她的花園裏。

sentences.english: Santiago drank sparingly from his water bottle during the hot afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在熾熱的下午，桑提亞哥節省地喝起水壺裏的水。

sentences.english: This afternoon, Smell the flowers , I watched A song to remember.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，偷得浮生半日閒，看了《一曲難忘》。

sentences.english: We left there at 5:00pm, and we were all very happy for this excursion.
sentences.chinese: 我們下午5點離開，我們都在這次郊遊中玩得很高興。

sentences.english: He buys fine pottery for his wife and takes long walks with her on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他給老婆買精緻的瓷器，星期天下午帶她散很長的步。
她於下午5時產下孿生兒。

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: At three-fifteen the following afternoon, Persky worked his wizardry again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天下午三點十五分，帕斯基再次施展魔法。

sentences.english: Good - bye, Gian Battista. Kiss the little ones for me . Good - bye, Teresa.
sentences.chinese: 那天下午亞瑟感到有必要多散一會兒步。

sentences.english: We brainstormed for most of the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午的大部分時間我們都在開獻策攻關會。

sentences.english: It could make you more alert and help you avoid an afternoon energy slump.
sentences.chinese: 它能讓你更加清醒，還能幫你避免下午犯困。

sentences.english: Are you going to the tailgate party this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你今天下午要去足球賽前的聚會嗎？

sentences.english: By the time afternoon rolls around, you’re in caffeine withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 下午時光流逝，你沉浸在咖啡因裏面。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
